sentences.english: "Hezhe" belongs to the language system of "Mundarin", It means "the oriental people".
sentences.chinese: “赫哲”是满语，大意是指“东方的人们”。

sentences.english: A few others in Sanjiazi speak a bit of Manchu.
sentences.chinese: 三家子的只有一些村民会讲少量的满语。

sentences.english: Hanyu with the Manchu influence spread southward.
sentences.chinese: 受满语影响的汉语遂向南传播。

sentences.english: Manchu language education has been mainly in some universities abroad.
sentences.chinese: 在国外，满语教学主要集中在部分大学。

sentences.english: About six years ago Sanjiazi set up the country's first Manchu school.
sentences.chinese: 大约六年前，在三家村成立了中国第一所满语学校。

definition: Daur language (of Daur ethnic group of Inner Mongolia and Heilongjiang)
Hezhen language (of Hezhen ethnic group of Heilongjiang province)
Manchu ethnic group of Liaoning province
Ewenke language (of Ewenke ethnic group of Inner Mongolia)
Manchu household register (during the Qing Dynasty)
ancient ethnic group of northeast frontier of China
